title: After Disconnecting Because of Lag I tried to Reconnect but it just says "Game still in progress.."
body: I disconnected because of internet reasons and when I tried to reconnect there wasn't even a button for me to reconnect back to the game. Just says "Game still in progress..." I don't know if its a bug on the new client but I'm risking getting suspended for leaving because I'm not able to reconnect. please riot fix this ASAP!!!

replies.body:
Did you have any other windows of League open in the background? I've heard of this recently, but I haven't seen a screenshot of when this occurs.

If this happens again, can you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) so I can see what's going on?
